title: CorelDraw discovers OpenType.
content:

quoting their newsletter: <cite>Create beautiful text! A reengineered text engine lets you take advantage of advanced OpenType typography features, letting you choose alternative appearances for individual characters, or glyphs, to suit your stylistic preference, provided the font supports advanced OpenType. </cite>
author: russellm

comments.content: Yes, A friend of mine is using it. He reports that it is pretty cool.
